entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
